content: needle then knit the 3 sts on the cable needle onto the right needle c6f slip next 3 sts onto cable needle and hold in front of the work knit the following 3 sts from left needle onto the right needle then knit the 3 sts on the cable needle onto the right needle c2b slip next st onto cable needle and hold at back of work knit the next st from left needle onto the right then knit the st from the cable needle onto the right needle c2f slip next st onto cable needle and hold at the front of the work knit the next st from left needle onto the right then knit the st from cable needle onto the right needle 2 ©2016 natalie raedwulf all rights reserved in purchasing this pattern you agree to print and use this pattern only for your personal non-commercial use you may not distribute or sell electronic or paper copies of this pattern without permission from nat raedwulf for inquiries please email wolfandfaunknits@gmail com abbreviations bobble bind off puff&b- purl front and back increase 1 co cast on stitch c2b cable 2 back see note pm place marker c2f cable 2 front see note p2tog purl 2 together c6b cable 6 back see note st /sts stitch / stitches c6f cable 6 forward see note k - knit p - purl directions top down using 5 mm/ us size 7 needles co 44 50 56 sts dividing evenly on each side of your circulars or dpns pm join round being careful not to twist top rib k1 p1 ribbing for 10 rounds body of leg wamers switch to 5 5 mm / us size 9 needles set up row p 1 puff&b p until end of round 45 51 57 sts total begin body of cable pattern row 1 k2 p1 k2 p2 k12 p2 k2 p1 *k2 p1 repeat from * until end of round row 2 k2 p1 c2f p2 k12 p2 c2b p1 *k2 p1 repeat from * until end of round row 3 repeat row 1 row 4 k2 p1 c2f p2 c6f c6b p2 c2b p1 *k2 p1 repeat from * until end of round row 5 repeat row 1 row 6 repeat row 2 repeat row 1-6 9 more times for a total of 10 repetitions in total next row p 1 p 2tog p until end of round 46 50 56 sts total bottom ribbing k1 p1 ribbing for 12 rounds bobble block and weave in ends 3 ©2016 natalie raedwulf all rights reserved in purchasing this pattern you agree to print and use this pattern only for your personal non-commercial use you may not distribute or sell electronic or paper copies of this pattern without permission from nat raedwulf for inquiries please email wolfandfaunknits@gmail com
